reading_texts.title: Test Reading Passage
reading_texts.content:
This is a test reading passage to demonstrate manual markers.

Using the automatic marker format is simple. For example, [Q1]manual markers work perfectly in reading passages just like they do in listening transcripts. This is very convenient.

You can also use the manual HTML format for more control. For instance, the system highlights the correct text when you click the show button which helps students find answers quickly.

Both methods are now fully supported and work seamlessly with the "Show in the reading passage" button.
